oai_dc:dc.dc:description: SP4 Thomas W. Page, of Clarksville, TN, leans with his left elbow against a 2 1/2 ton military transport truck in Vietnam. Page was with the 299th Combat Engineer Battalion. In the background is a populated area with a mountain in the distance.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Military personnel; Soldiers; Military uniforms; Military vehicles
Ammons, Christoper D., 1948- ; Vietnam War, 1961-1975; Vietnam; United States. Army. Engineer Combat Battalion, 299th; Vehicles, Military
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ammons, Christoper D., 1948-
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Christopher Ammons was born in Norfolk, Virginia, on April 18, 1948. He enlisted in the Army on June 1, 1967, serving first with the 1st Infantry Division and later with the 194th Military Police Company. He served two tours in Vietnam, 1967-1968 and 1969-1970. His photographs show details of the daily life of soldiers in Vietnam.
